scenario_1.persona_content: Mahout is an open source machine learning library from Apache, designed for scalable and efficient processing of large datasets. It provides algorithms for collaborative filtering, a key area of machine learning, and can be used in both local and distributed modes, depending on the scale of the data. Mahout is scalable and can process recommendations from up to 100 million records at real time, making it a popular choice for big data processing and analysis. It is suitable for users who are interested in collaborative filtering and machine learning, and are looking for a scalable and efficient solution for their data processing needs.
scenario_1.thought: As a system designed for efficient processing, I would prefer the option that maximizes the total utility while maintaining some level of fairness. The right option gives both Person A and Person B 400, which seems more balanced than giving Person B 600 and Person A 0. Therefore, I choose the right option.
